title: Winter Clothing Drive
description: Collecting and distributing coats, scarves, and gloves to help individuals stay warm.

supportDivision.name: Coat Distribution
supportDivision.description: Distribute winter coats to families in need.

supportDivision.name: Accessory Aid
supportDivision.description: Provide scarves, socks, and gloves for additional warmth.

title: Blanket Donation Campaign
description: Providing warm blankets to protect from cold nights in rural areas.

supportDivision.name: Blanket Relief
supportDivision.description: Ensure every household has at least one warm blanket.

title: Warm Clothes for Rural Kids
description: Delivering jackets, sweaters, and hats to children in underserved areas.

supportDivision.name: Children's Winter Aid
supportDivision.description: Provide winter clothes for vulnerable children.

title: Emergency Winter Relief
description: Fundraising for immediate distribution of winter essentials.

supportDivision.name: Relief Kits
supportDivision.description: Includes blankets, winter clothes, and food supplies.

title: Heating Support for Families
description: Providing heating materials like firewood or portable heaters for poor families.

supportDivision.name: Heating Solutions
supportDivision.description: Deliver heating equipment or financial support for fuel.

title: Winter Accessories Drive
description: Providing socks, gloves, and woolen caps to those in need.

supportDivision.name: Essential Accessories
supportDivision.description: Distribute winter accessories to the elderly and children.

title: Urban Winter Aid
description: Focusing on homeless populations in urban areas to provide warm clothing.

supportDivision.name: Homeless Outreach
supportDivision.description: Deliver coats and blankets to homeless individuals in cities.

title: Community Winter Shelter Support
description: Setting up and equipping community shelters with winter necessities.

supportDivision.name: Shelter Supplies
supportDivision.description: Provide blankets and winter clothes for shelter residents.

title: Winter Supplies for Women
description: Supporting single mothers and women with winter essentials.

supportDivision.name: Women's Aid
supportDivision.description: Provide warm clothing and blankets for women-led households.
